title: Новая Фабрика звёзд
overview: Legendary music project returns to the big screen! See the Grand opening concert of the "New idol" featuring the top artists of the country. Producer Victor Drobysh is 16 young talents, who were selected from over 15,000 applicants. It is to them within the next 4 months will undergo intensive training in the basics of show business, to win the love of the audience and become the new stars.
